text.text_translated: In 2003, Suzanne Collins was watching TV. She changed the channels. The USA was in a war in Iraq. She saw TV shows about real people. They played games to win a lot of money. She also saw news about the war. These two things mixed together. It felt strange to her. Then she got the idea for a book about games.
